channel.title: Quora 热门回答
channel.description: 用中文浏览Quora上的热门回答

item.title: What are three simple ways that companies can start to address the climate emergency in their business today? Bestselling author & founder/CEO of @WeFirstBranding, @simonmainwaring, shares his expert opinion. https://t.co/CDWoFiBC3B

How do you know if someone really knows what they're talking about or is just making it up as they go? How would you assess Bill Otto's expertise in satellite imaging? https://t.co/ze0KVdy5Il https://t.co/yqbNFYFreK
Question: What's a forgotten gaming fad? https://t.co/IycAx9AT3E https://t.co/3XAJaflgjz

Didn't I just see @buster talking about the challenges of scaling a community? Will NFT communities scale or just proliferate in number, and will that address the issues of moderation he highlighted? https://t.co/VWTIgZJI1v

Why does "finding your flow" matter for creative entrepreneurs? Co-Founder of Bullfrog Agency, and stunt marketing expert, @stuntmanhunter, breaks down his three part strategy. https://t.co/6L1uiSXo9h https://t.co/zc6gmyBuZF

Does taking a gap year make you seem undesirable to colleges? Founder & CEO @moon_prep, Kristen Moon, who provides personalized application guidance, tells you what she thinks! https://t.co/1tpQWrcIY0 https://t.co/IZfQlU06Xq
Getting some negative feedback? Business and branding mentor, @CWaltersPhD gives four tips for productively responding to criticism. https://t.co/cQ02bC2EgO https://t.co/wDlJ8DuK1E
Should you keep your personal goals a secret? Expert goal setter, Corey Fradin, founder of QuickBooost, literally weighs in. https://t.co/C2OiDNG4Eb https://t.co/GHRuiXE1HA
What was the last real breakthrough in computer programming? Monads/monoids? Functional programming? The debate heats up: https://t.co/ASEPFxpTkP
What are some strategies that businesses can take to deal with being short-staffed? Answer by branding expert, @CWaltersPhD. https://t.co/HE4DHfQevb https://t.co/PoHYEDFSH6

How has the pandemic fueled impostor syndrome and self-sabotage? Business & branding mentor and corporate trainer, @CWaltersPhD shares five tips for overcoming both. https://t.co/FOGIRLPCgr https://t.co/GKtBEOuUGx
How can AI be best used in education and play? Engineer & Founder @soapboxlabs @ScanlonPatricia explains! https://t.co/49rH9NDb1Z https://t.co/znTOX9fgen

What do businesses need to know about OSHA's new Emergency temporary Standard (ETS) regarding COVID vaccination and testing? Chief HR Legal Expert, Kara Govro, breaks it down. https://t.co/8feNIemrXO https://t.co/5dyYiNRG2X

Answer to What are some examples of creativity being used to survive? by John Robertson https://t.co/NKfgP8dHW8 https://t.co/QoQ5ELUQxt

What exactly is impostor syndrome, and what can you do about it? Advice from @sabrinahorn, bestselling author of "Make It, Don't Fake It: Leading with Authenticity for Real Business Success". https://t.co/kpMsDBX0Pl https://t.co/ink2adRtJy

Are you a leader who's made a mistake? You aren't alone. Here's advice from the bestselling author of "Make It, Don't Fake It: Leading with Authenticity for Real Business Success", @sabrinahorn on how to rebound with dignity. https://t.co/p6hh1YrWoA https://t.co/OAO9uciBTI
Scientists have techne, engineers have metis. What's common knowledge in your field? https://t.co/QMXNfCLo5r

Everyone's an expert on supply chains now, but only Quora has the real experts to explain in detail why the self-proclaimed experts are wrong: https://t.co/0XjIgXyxGG Actually, Twitter does have @man_integrated. What do we need to do to get you on Quora, Huntsman?
What are some strategies that businesses can take to deal with being short-staffed? @CWaltersPhD, MBA has some tips: https://t.co/8kazwA5CF7
Do you know what animal has three vaginas? Trevor Best does and explains why that's not so weird: https://t.co/0mlAAPzp5M
